reviewText: Must see for all people with kids with disabilities OR without.  You can learn a lot about children with special needs from the video.  If you're special education teacher, it's worth a  look.

This is an exceptionally good video for both teachers and parents who either work with or have a special needs child. I work with special needs kids as both a teacher and a 1:1 PCA (Personal Care Assistant) and highly recommend this video!

I bought this DVD because of Sly appears in it and I'll keep with my Sly DVD collection, the DVD have a such good message about child needs and and other good stuff for familes which they explain a variety of situations happend to different families.
